title: [TDD] MCP Migration - Red Phase
description:
Write failing tests for MCP migration to DO standard:
- Test gitx.do extends DO base class
- Test MCP uses inherited search/fetch/do tools only
- Test custom git operations accessible via do() code execution
- Test allowedMethods includes git operations (commit, push, pull, branch, etc.)
- Test search() queries commits, files, and refs
- Test fetch() retrieves object by SHA or ref
- Test do() can execute git command sequences

All tests should FAIL initially (Red phase).
Replaces custom MCP tools: git_commit, git_push, git_branch, etc.

title: [TDD] MCP Migration - Green Phase
description:
Implement minimal code to pass all migration tests:
- Extend DO base class: class GitRepo extends DO
- Remove custom MCP tools, inherit from DO
- Add git operations to allowedMethods Set
- Implement search() to query commits/files
- Implement fetch() to resolve object by SHA/ref
- Ensure do() has git operations in scope

Focus on making tests pass with simplest implementation.

title: [TDD] MCP Migration - Refactor Phase
description:

Tests must continue passing.
